how_to_title: How to Merge PDF Files online for Free
how_to_step_five: Click ‘Save and Download’ to combine and download your PDF.
how_to_step_four: Rotate or delete pages, if needed.
how_to_step_one: Click on the 'Choose File' button and select or drag and drop the PDF file(s) into the tool.
how_to_step_three: Arrange pages in the desired order by dragging and dropping them.
how_to_step_two: Click on the 'Add File' button to add additional PDF files to the merge queue.
feature_five_text: This tool is designed for all users, advanced knowledge is not required. So, It's easy to merge PDF files.
feature_four_text: Working with PDF Merger is absolutely secure. The entire process of joining PDF files happens on the client side (directly in your browser), no third parties can access your data.
feature_one_text: Thanks to its powerful merging processing capabilities, this tool is able to merge multiple PDF files in a shorter amount of time.
feature_six_text: You can access or use the PDF Merger online on the Internet using any browser from any operating system.
feature_three_text: This tool enables you to merge, reorder, delete, and rotate PDF pages, giving you complete control over the final document before saving it.
feature_two_text: You can use this PDF merging tool online for free and with no limits on the number of times you can use it to merge PDF files.
page_header_text: Combine PDFs in the order you want with the easiest PDF merger available.
